features.name: Authentication
features.description: Role-based authentication using Supabase Auth with JWT tokens. Supports roles: ADMIN, MANAGER, OPS_STAFF, WAREHOUSE_STAFF, FINANCE_STAFF, SUPPORT

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with KPIs, quick actions, and real-time activity feed

features.name: Shipments Management
features.description: Create, track, and manage shipments with AWB number generation and status lifecycle

features.name: Manifests Management
features.description: Create manifests, assign shipments, and manage manifest status workflow (DRAFT → OPEN → CLOSED → DEPARTED → ARRIVED)

features.name: Scanning Module
features.description: Barcode scanning with offline queue support, duplicate detection, and sync functionality

features.name: Invoices Management
features.description: Create invoices with tax calculations, issue invoices, and generate PDF documents

features.name: Customers Management
features.description: Manage customer records with contact information and billing details

features.name: Tracking
features.description: Real-time shipment tracking with event history and status updates

features.name: Exceptions Handling
features.description: Handle and resolve shipment exceptions with workflow for resolution

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Business analytics and reporting with charts and metrics

features.name: Management (Admin)
features.description: Staff and organization management for ADMIN users

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Centralized error handling with user-friendly messages and toast notifications

features.name: PDF Generation
features.description: Generate PDF documents for shipment labels and invoices with barcodes

features.name: Hubs Management
features.description: Manage hub/location records for origin and destination routing
